column2:
"...These are the ARKS regulations
written strictly but mainly the gist of it."

"[Once the specified conditions were
achieved, free exploration of the Undersea
area of Wopal will be allowed.]"

"By getting good grades in training, you
can increase the degree of freedom as
ARKS."

"And of course, I'm sure you'll understand
its meaning and value.
Now it's up to you to accept them or not."
